name: geb-subgraph
description: The Graph protocol subgraph for GEB

scripts.deploy-local: npm run prepare-${NETWORK:-mainnet} && sleep 45 && npm run codegen && npm run create; graph deploy --node ${GRAPH_ADMIN_RPC_URL} --ipfs ${IPFS_URL} ${SUBGRAPH_NAME}
scripts.deploy-hosted-kovan: npm run prepare-kovan && npm run codegen && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ reflexer-labs/rai-kovan
scripts.deploy-hosted-mainnet: npm run prepare-mainnet && npm run codegen && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ reflexer-labs/rai-mainnet
scripts.deploy-hosted-dev: npm run prepare-mainnet && npm run codegen && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ guifel/geb
scripts.deploy-hosted-dev-kovan: npm run prepare-kovan && npm run codegen && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ guifel/gebkovan
scripts.prepare-mainnet: mustache config/mainnet.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache config/mainnet.json src/utils/addresses.template.ts > src/utils/addresses.ts
scripts.prepare-kovan: mustache config/kovan.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache config/kovan.json src/utils/addresses.template.ts > src/utils/addresses.ts
scripts.prepare-fantom: mustache config/fantom.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache config/fantom.json src/utils/addresses.template.ts > src/utils/addresses.ts
scripts.prepare-sepolia: mustache config/sepolia.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache config/sepolia.json src/utils/addresses.template.ts > src/utils/addresses.ts
scripts.prepare-goerli: mustache config/goerli.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache config/goerli.json src/utils/addresses.template.ts > src/utils/addresses.ts
scripts.prepare-test: mustache config/test.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache config/test.json src/utils/addresses.template.ts > src/utils/addresses.ts

author: peakaw
